headline: Conservative Pundit Suspended By YouTube Doubles Down, Dares Them In Based Email Response
author: Red Voice Media
sentences:

— Bongino Report (@BonginoReport) January 14, 2022
Here is the full email:
Once again, the left is trying to keep power and control to ensure the American people only get the picture they want you to see and not the reality of what is going on.

Dan Bongino responded to YouTube suspending his account after the Biden Administration asked Big Tech to censor anyone who questions Biden’s regime with a feisty response, telling YouTube to, Kiss my a**.”
Bongino had posted a video to YouTube stating that masks are “useless” in stopping the spread of Covid19.
YouTube’s policies specifically prohibit anyone from stating that masks are ineffective at stopping the spread of Covid19.
Well, if YouTube was expecting some type of apology from Bongino, it is safe to say that day would never come.

— Bongino Report (@BonginoReport) January 15, 2022
This piece was written by Zach Heilman on January 15, 2022.
The Big Tech company suspended Bongino’s channel for a week on Friday and demonetized it for 30 days.
The company claims Bongino violated their policies by spreading misinformation about Covid19.
Instead, Bongino had a few choice words for the platform after his account was suspended.

:
